elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Answer the questions about the text.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What are the most important public tasks of the state?
elements.correctAnswer: Social welfare, transport, national defense, agriculture, education and research

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Why do citizens have to pay taxes?
elements.correctAnswer: The state has public duties and must provide public facilities and infrastructure services: Schools (education), public and private transport, national defense, old-age provision, waste disposal, etc.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: What types of taxes are there?
elements.correctAnswer: There are indirect and direct taxes at federal, cantonal and municipal level.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: What does an application dossier contain?
elements.correctAnswer: Letter of application (cover letter), curriculum vitae in tabular form, copies of all references, copies of professional or academic qualifications, copies of diplomas/certificates of further education, references (recommendations)
